original: Bredberg, Per Leo Valdemar, auktoriserad revisor, Göteborg, f. 31/10/87 i Grythyttan, Örebro 1., av stinsen M. B. o. Sofia Sundin. G. m. Hildur He-delius. Barn: Karin, g. m. platschef R. Berg, Sörforsa, Margareta, g. m. Arthur Thiel, Sthlm. — Stud:ex. i Falun 06, Schartaus hand:inst. 07, hand:högsk. i Köln 09. Res. t. Tyskl., Engl., Holl., Belg. o. USA. Anst. h. NK i Sthlm 09-10, sekr. i Sv. industri-förb. 10-12, lär. i hand:tekn. v. HHS 11-12, bokför :chef i St. Kopparbergs A-B i Falun 12-17, bitr. dir. i A-B Sv. Finansinst. 18-21, disp. v. Forsviks A-B 22-32, egen firma Leo Bredbergs Revisionsbyrå i Gbg sed. 37.
translated: Bredberg, Per Leo Valdemar, authorized auditor, Gothenburg, born October 31, 1887 in Grythyttan, Örebro County. Son of the stationmaster M.B. and Sofia Sundin. Married to Hildur Hedelius. Children: Karin who married plant manager R. Berg, Sörforsa, and Margareta who married Arthur Thiel, Stockholm. He graduated from Schartau business school in Falun in 1906, and then attended Handelshögskolan in Cologne in 1909. He traveled to Germany, England, Holland, Belgium and the USA. He worked for NK in Stockholm from 1909-1910, SEI (Swedish Industry Association) as secretary from 1910-1912, and taught at HHS (Handelshögskolan) in 1911-1912. From 1912-1917, he was the chief accountant at Stora Kopparbergs A-B in Falun, and from 1918-1921, he worked as an assistant director at A-B Svenska Finansinst. From 1922-1932 he was a disponent at Forsviks A-B. From 1937 onwards, he ran his own firm, Leo Bredberg's Audit Office, in Gothenburg.
